channel.title: CVE Feed for Wpmet -- Elements Kit Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wpmet -- Elements Kit Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-24258|2024-08-03T19:28:22.245Z -- wpmet -- elements%20kit%20lite
item.description: The Elements Kit Lite and Elements Kit Pro WordPress Plugins before 2.2.0 have a number of widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
